Name: TV Program Duration At Network
Description: This is a compound-value type that contains information about how long a TV series aired at a given network.

Properties.Name: From
Properties.Description: Air date of the first episode broadcast on this network.

Properties.Name: Network
Properties.Description: The network that the show first aired on (i.e., not in syndication).

Properties.Name: Program
Properties.Description: The name of the TV program.

Properties.Name: To
Properties.Description: Air date of the last episode broadcast on this network.
